bill.title: Providing for consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 6) adopting the Rules of the House of Representatives for the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress; providing for consideration of the bill (H.B. 21) making appropriations for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2019, and for other purposes; and providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 1) making further continuing appropriations for the Department of Homeland Security for fiscal year 2019, and for other purposes.
bill.description: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 6 (adopting the Rules of the House of Representatives for the 116th Congress), H.B. 21 (Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2019), and H.J.Res. 1 (FY2019 Department of Homeland Security appropriations).

history.action: Considered as privileged matter. (consideration: CR H8-17)
Mr. Brady moved to refer to a select committee.
Mr. McGovern moved to table the motion to refer
On motion to table the motion to refer Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 230 - 197 (Roll no. 3).
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 5.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 233 - 197 (Roll no. 4). (consideration: CR H15-16)
Mr. Cole moved to commit with instructions. (text: CR H16)
The previous question on the motion to commit with instructions was ordered without objection.
On motion to commit with instructions Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 197 - 232 (Roll no. 5).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 194 (Roll no. 6). (text: CR H8)
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

votes.desc: On motion to table the motion to refer RC# 3
On ordering the previous question RC# 4
On motion to commit with instructions RC# 5
On agreeing to the resolution RC# 6
